Sage Bionetworks - Senior Product Designer - REMOTE (US) - Full-Time - $105.5K - $174.9K

Sage Bionetworks is a renowned nonprofit in biomedical and life sciences, headquartered in Seattle but operating remotely across the U.S. We develop Synapse (https://www.synapse.org/) and other tools to support scientific research in areas like cancer, Alzheimer's, and Neurofibromatosis. We believe in open science, and we've been practicing it for over 15 years.

We're seeking a Senior Product Designer with strong user research experience, and visual / graphic design skills. In addition to a competitive salary and great benefits, this role offers the opportunity to contribute to meaningful work that advances science and improves lives. One of the best perks of working as a Designer at Sage is the time and space to research, test, and refine designs, ensuring they are done right and not rushed.

Contact: alberto.pepe (at) sagebase.org
